title: Over priced
text: Good restaurant, good food, always fresh, good services, crowded all the time, better reserve in advance. Be aware, prices are high.

title: Somehow expensive, but worth it
text: Good food, great services, over priced, good summer location, not the best in Broumana. Try it you won't lose the experience.

title: Bad smell
text: If you are ready for the cow smell, then you can visit this place. A place for family retreats along with kids, however you had been warned.

title: Shopping
text: Best place in Athens if you like souvenirs shopping, be aware, prices varies from shop to shop, explore it all then decide to purchase the best price.

title: Historical facts
text: Plan ahead for that visit, use one day to appreciate the history behind it. Take a break when you reach the top and enjoy the rest.

title: Top view
text: Worth visiting to see Athens from above, don't expect too much, go for hiking, if you can't then use cable car.

title: Konstantina and all the staff
text:
Comfort bed, good location, walkable to most sites such Acropolis and much more, Syntagma Square is 12 minutes walking or 6â‚¬ by taxi. BEYOND wonderful staff especially Konstatina. Lovely atmosphere and professional management, welcome and farewell drinks. NICE rooms, enough space, strangely new walk in shower, but very tiny and small toilet room.
Very good value for money, healthy breakfast just what you need, also lunch and dinner.
Finally, there's no doubt that this hotel is the most perfect place to stay while visiting Athens.
Thank you B4B Athens Signature Hotel for making our stay enjoyable.

title: Busy square
text: It is where all the crowd gather, people just crowded there, coffee, tea, drink, walk, views, photos, wonderful time

title: Great Food
text: Whenever you are in Bologna, eat there, lunch, dinner or just a drink, various wine and all are delicious

title: Tawouk
text: Big and healthy sandwich, cheap price, full belly, multiple food choices, very clean, professional staff

title: Excellent Location,Services,Clean, Staff,centre etc....,,,, what do you need more?
text:
Very central, excellent location, superb staff, good breakfast, nice rooms, very good services, five stars, modern hotel, classic on the outside, wonderful from inside, best breakfast service and varieties. Modern room, small bathroom, free tea and coffee, free espresso, free water (all paid in the rate -:) ,however you will enjoy it a lot, therefore go for it, book it, use it and you will never regret it.
Keep the good job NH, as already said "Go that extra mile", highly recommended, will be back soon.

title: It's ok NH, not collection
text:
Check in and out was okay, breakfast okay, room small, comfy bed and pillows, clean, okay location, not far central station, somehow far from centre, but walkable, okay lobby, okay reception staff, none smiley breakfast staff, don't know why!!!! Hey guys wake up and serve.
All in all that's what we paid for.
Thankd NH
PS: I am an NH member and found cheaper price on booking.com, therefore NH review your pricing policy so we continue using your site.

title: Don't think twice
text:
First impression count and last forever.
7 stars accommodation, 7 stars comfort, 7 stars breakfast, don't think twice to decide, just go for it, will never regret your choice.
Clean, comfortable beds, spacious rooms, superb bathroom, wonderful suite, lovely atmosphere, quiet and away from city's noise. Professional staff from reception to waiters, always friendly and attentive and helpful, moreover smiley faces all day long. If you dig searching for any negative thing, you won't find any.

title: High class restaurant
text: Suitable for families, groups, couples and much more. Kids play, delightful food, nice services and great fun.

title: Great experience
text:
Overall was a nice stay, however mattress were not comfortable although did not complain to the management. Breakfast was somehow poor.

Veronica stara is like a sunshine for the hotel, very helpful, always smiley despite any situation.
Five star certificate to Veronica stara.

title: Marriott will never disappoint you
text:
I don't need 200 characters to write about Marriott, especially Courtyard Center Park in Rome, one word is enough "Astonishing" from every aspect, whether rooms,services, staff and location, mostly the view.
Recommended for every type of traveling, business, leisure or any type.
place: Courtyard by Marriott Rome Central Park

title: Not the first time
text: It is not the first time that i use the services and they were always punctual and on time. Excellent services and super accurate. I recommend it to everyone.

title: Hilton never cheat on you
text: If you are looking for saving on your accommodation, this would be the perfect hotel, if you don't mind paying 40 euro each and every day to go to the center and return, it you are a group of four taxi is for you, if you are two persons then bus number 22 would be the cheapest way, enjoy your stay

title: Excellent service
text: Very professional in everything, timing, car, service, drivers, beyond expectations. Easy way to book online, accurate, cheapest prices and more.

title: Avoid it
text: Over priced for nothing special. Just burger with no special taste or special ingredients . Not worthy no value

title: Very nice food
text:
Nice atmosphere with nice view, food, services, prices and most the hygiene.
At the end the fruits, don't skip it at all.

title: Great location
text:
Best location, never regret, best place to stay if you like center. Breakfast is ok, room comfy, very busy location at night and day.
Helpful staff, close to everything, restaurants, pubs, cafe shops etc...

title: Good hotel
text:
NH collection, Marseille, we thank you for our stay, however you need to fix the ugly smell in the elevator,
Very helpful staff, breakfast was ok, rooms are comfortable, however mattress need to be changed.

title: Surprise
text: Astonishing area.... go for it, stay at it, explore it and take more pictures of it and for yourself while visiting Minnewater Lake and Park

title: A real castle in A Royal city
text:
Dear reader, do not hesitate to book this hotel, believe it or not, you will do a very bad choice if you book another one.
Will not speak about the hotel, let it surprise you as much as we were surprised by it.
Never doubt about Grand Hotel Casselbetgh Bruges, your stay will be amazing and relaxing.

title: Wowwwwwww, deserve 10 stars and not 5
text:
Extremely super wonderful. We hesitate at first to book this hotel, but, at the end we made the exact right choice. What can you say about this hotel? All nice words in the dictionary won't be enough to express our joyful stay.. Rooms, bath, shower, lobbies, breakfast, staff, service etc.... you cannot take one tiny negative out of it...... all in all, definitely will stay and stay and stay again and again and again.
Thank You NH Collection Amsterdam Grand Hotel Krasnapolsky, we will never forget our positive and lovely experience with your respectful Hotel
place: NH Collection Amsterdam Grand Hotel Krasnapolsky

title: Just wonderful Hotel and staff
text: Super great location, comfort room, spacious, delicious breakfast, lovely and helpful staff with all means. We enjoyed our stay to the utmost. Easy access to Centraal station, Dam, Joordan. Close to everything. Thank you Kimpton De Witt for our lovely stay.

title: Very nice resort
text: All in all it was a nice experience to stay in a resort, a luxury one. Room was nice and clean, good service, good breakfast (American, British and Mediterranean style. Lovely side walk to down town crossing all resorts on Naama Bay.

title: The only place to eat a decent meal
text: The only place where you can find real food, real meal and nice table to sit and eat with peace of mind...

title: Red sea
text: At the end it is the red sea... Take the submarine tour and explore the amazing deep crystal blue water... No more info, just go for it and surprise yourself

title: Rocio and Paqui
text: Location is somehow near attractions. Room is spacious and clean, cannot complain. Breakfast was less than ordinary, at the end it is Novotel four stars rated. The biggest thanks will go to Rocio firstly which was very very helpful and super smily and beyond wonderful. Also Paqui was the competitor to Rocio, great two wonderful receptionist who played the role of a great Hotel Manager. Thank you again for making our stay so easy and delightful.

title: Interesting
text: Rooms are spacious and neat, very clean and comfortable, super multiple choice of breakfast, location not central, however Hop on Hop off station are 200 meters away from the hotel and you can purchase ticket from reception, go for two day ticket and explore all Barcelona, it cover all interesting places. Hotel area: There is some restaurants (which I did not like the food there) and some shopping malls... However go to Place Catalonya and Las Ramblas, much more choices...

title: Wow wow wow
text: Very huge and astonishing place, amazing architecture, if you opt to visit it during Easter then purchase tickets in advance

title: Shopping????
text: Historical building, weird architecture, in one word "Shopping", attraction for shopping lovers, like "Casa Malia""

title: Nice
text: Worth a visit and spend some time admiring this great place, don't miss it at any price..... Beautiful

title: WooooooooooooooWWWWWWWWWWWW
text: I think the title will speak of itself,,, really it is a magic fountain, a spectacle to watch over and over and over again, never get bored watching it,,, Go for it guys

title: Worthy
text: Make sure to get a guided tour and listen to every single (even boring) details, don't miss it.......

title: Avoid it
text: TGB or The Good Burger is nothing from it, not good and not burger, it is a greasy meat has a form of burger placed into two slices of so called wet bread... Don't eat there, avoid it

title: All in all, it is OK
text:
Location doesn't matter as long as the FREE SHUTTLE takes you to city center that if you were lucky to book it in advance before others, Hilton you must have more than one free shuttle.
Rooms are nice and clean, spacious and comfortable, good breakfast with lots of choice. Opt a high floor room to avoid cement factory noise behind the hotel.
If you like pizza, Domino's pizza is 150 meters next to the hotel on the opposite side. Bon appetit

title: Amazing
text: You will spend hours and hours without getting bored there. What a huge and amazing place... Don't miss it, you will be surprised

title: Surprise
text: If you miss visiting Maria Luisa park, then you missed all Seville. Really you will be surprised by everything in it,,, just visit it

title: Beautiful
text: Plaza de America, Maria Luisa Park, Plaza De Espagna, three places on the same line, start with Plaza America, cross to Maria Luisa Park then jump to Plaza de Espagna, start an early journey or have a three day stays.

title: Night and Day walk, all day
text: Sundown, your day is finish at Nice, "NO", it's just started, have a long long walk on "Promenade Des Anglais" dine at any place, food is just tasty and delicious, then walk along the promenade which you think you will not reach the end or the beginning , then have a drink and some rest, then continue walking while you admire the crystal blue beach and sea... Will leave the rest for you to explore, come on go there.

title: Nice place at Nice
text: You can find everything there, shops, restaurants, coffee, drink, monuments, water play, crowdy place, all nations are there, very attractive sight.

title: Superbe view of Nice
text: First of all take the lift, wonderful adventure unless you suffer from heart problem or you are afraid from dark spaces or etc... The view from top is not like any other view, enjoy the serenity of Nice, explore all the area there don't miss any spot, then relax and have a warm cup of coffee and go down by stairs.

title: Staying there is cleverness
text: Nice hotel in Nice location in Nice (city). Wonderful staff, wonderful location, wonderful services and room, but, boring breakfast (sorry about that) at the end it is my opinion and taste. I highly recommend this hotel for a long or short stay, clean room (Ibis always small room), very comfortable bed and pillow, very helpful reception. 3 minutes to train station where you can visit Cannes and Monte Carlo (cheap ticket by train). Surely will stay there again.

title: Location what makes difference
text: What a great location, Trevi fountain is just a walking distance, Military museum just next door, Spanish steps, steps for just 15 minutes. Colosseum 10 minutes walking, room very clean, nice (but not too much choice) breakfast on rooftop, you can explore all Rome on foot from this hotel (be aware in August, too hot).

title: Super friendly staff and location
text: Just as expected from Marriott chain, luxury, comfort, high service, good location, spacious room, one negative thing was the bathroom, need maintenance but it is OK. Breakfast on terrace, solarium on 10th floor where you can relax and have a sun bath, comfortable lobby to rest, attractive location, high service for all tours including hop on hop off discounted ticket.

title: Worth the trip and effort
text: Go for it, don't hesitate visiting Sorrento, Positano, Amalfi and Amalfi Coast, buy some lemoncello and meloncello.

title: Luxury under your feet
text: Clean, spacious room, very good breakfast on terrace, easy access to main attractions, very helpful staff, comfortable beds and pillows, located on main shopping street, you can feel the warm welcome as soon as you step in. Strongly recommended to visit Genoa, surely will use it again.

title: Not that good service
text: Not much to tell except service was not good at all, nothing was served on the flight although they said refreshments on board.

title: So excellent hotel
text: Relaxant, good ambiance, great location, room spacious and very clean, nice breakfast restaurant, over all positive experience and vacation, all attractions was within walking distance. Very helpful staff and management.
